text: We observed that 7 % of the reviewed sequences that contains at least one putative LIR motif correspond to the genome polyprotein from various viruses . Because polyproteins are processed co - and post - translationally by both host and viral proteases , we ran a systematic PubMed search with the terms ' name of the virus C autophagy ' followed by ' name of the virus C LC3 ' to restrain the result outcome as necessary , finally we looked for papers ( excluding reviews and commentaries ) that specifically mention proteins derived from the processing of the viral genome polyprotein .
